hero.title: Work with a developer who ships and cares about outcomes.
hero.description: I'm Terry, a freelance developer focused on shipping usable MVPs and real AI features. I like short cycles, clear KPIs, and code that you can maintain after I'm gone.

items.mvpSpeed: Go from idea to first usable MVP in 4-6 weeks, with a tiny surface area and a clear scope.
items.aiFeature: Ship one real AI feature in 14 days that reduces steps, response time, or support load.
items.roadmap: Turn a fuzzy roadmap into a 30-60 day plan you can defend to your team and stakeholders.
items.maintenance: Keep your product fast, online, and healthy without surprise firefights every week.

sprints.title: Short, focused sprints
sprints.description: We cut scope hard, ship something small that works, then iterate. Weekly demos, no black box.

production.title: Production over prototypes
production.description: I think in terms of uptime, observability, and handover. Features are built to survive real users, not just demos.

stack.title: Clear, modern stack
stack.description: Next.js, TypeScript, Postgres, and modern AI tooling. Typed, modular code that your team can pick up.

products.label: Products & contexts
products.description: SaaS, internal tools, and AI assistants for small teams and founders who need to move fast without burning their runway.

built.label: What I've built
built.description: MVPs from scratch, integrations, AI-powered search & assistants, dashboards, and maintenance/hosting setups for live products.

showUp.label: How I show up
showUp.description: I work like an embedded teammate: async-friendly, opinionated on scope, and comfortable owning a problem from idea to production.

human.title: A bit more human
human.paragraph1: I'm based at Charleroi in Belgium, working mostly with European teams. I've spent my time between building products, integrating AI into existing apps, and keeping production systems healthy.
human.paragraph2: Off-screen, I care about the same things that make good software: discipline, small improvements, and long-term thinking.

cta.title: Ready to work together?
cta.description: Let's discuss your MVP, AI feature, or product roadmap and see what's realistic in the next 30-60 days.
